TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamespaceMapEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides information that the uses for mapping between an XML namespace, a CLR namespace, and the assembly that contains the relevant types for that CLR namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This type is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML. If you use it in a general XAML implementation, you must include the WPF assemblies. Alternative techniques that do not require including WPF assemblies include referencing the XAML schema context (available in a service provider context from , or from from a XAML node loop or general XAML writer frame of reference.) The XAML schema context includes API for returning its assemblies, preferred prefix mappings, and XAML namespace information. ## XAML Text Usage

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public NamespaceMapEntry (string xmlNamespace, string assemblyName, string clrNamespace);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string xmlNamespace, string assemblyName, string clrNamespace) cil managed

Docs.param: The mapping prefix for the XML namespace.
The assembly that contains the CLR namespace and types to map to the XML namespace.
The CLR namespace in the assembly that contains the relevant types.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using provided XML namespace, CLR namespace, and assembly information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the "simple name" form for `assemblyName`. In particular, do not specify pathing, and do not include the file extension. This is analogous to the form that might be reported by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. Paths are specified separately; see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.SetAssemblyPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the assembly name that contains the types in the CLR namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the "simple name" form for . In particular, do not specify the full path, and do not include the file extension. This is analogous to the form that might be reported by . ## XAML Text Usage

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the CLR namespace that contains the types being mapped.
Docs.exception: The value is being set to is .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the mapping prefix for the XML namespace being mapped to.
